text: Hi. Just wondering whether people have used HubSpot for any sort of live webinar set up. Integrations/other tools etc?

Guess that depends what you mean by that. People use it for event pages and yes depending on the type you are using for the webinar you usually can add an embed code to your site or a link to join the webinar

Haven't personally taken it but heard many good things. Jen Simmons front end course is now free. For context, she has worked for both Firefox and Safari and is part of the CSS working group. She's had a hand in CSS Grid, as well as the recent browser change to make browsers estimate image size based on aspect ratio preventing CLS.
<https://twitter.com/jensimmons/status/1278393550359666690?s=20|https://twitter.com/jensimmons/status/1278393550359666690?s=20>
